Berry's Bullets has been a leading manufacturer of top-notch bullets for shooters worldwide for more than six decades. Founded in 1961 by Ray Berry, Berry's remains a family-owned and operated company to this day. When Ray faced an unfortunate industrial accident, his son Gilbert took charge of the business at the young age of 18, carrying forward his father's legacy.
